column4: Can someone help me with DynDNS? I have a domain from dyndns. The problem is that I always have to login to the dyndns in order to refresh the ip. I believe that I should install something in my ubuntu to "tell" dyndns which is my current ip.. Does anyone know what should I do? If i have to install a program, which one should I install and how to configure it?

I remember, now, that I have alreayd installed "ddclient" (i believe this is what u mean). But I have no idea How to use it. I just ran it, and I have an error, http://pastebin.ca/1541780 Do you know anything about this ?
